description: These little sandwich bites make a very appealing addition to a picnic spread.
name: Herby Goat’s Cheese Pinwheel Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the 2 cheeses in a large bowl with the herbs and lemon zest and beat with a wooden spoon until combined. Season well with pepper and a little salt (be careful as goat’s cheese can be quite salty).
Trim the crusts off the bread and roll each slice out with a rolling pin until it is as flat as possible. Spread each slice with butter on one side only.

Spread each slice of bread with one-quarter of the cheese mixture and roll it up, starting from a short edge. Trim the edges neatly with a serrated knife and cut each roll in half, then in half again, to make 4 pieces per sandwich. Serve cut-sides up to show the swirled effect, or pack into a container for transportation.
